general.gigTitle: create wordpress site, develop custom wordpress, business website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Be Creative and Level Up Your Website
sellerCard.description:
I'm Rifat, a CMS expert and Web developer. I have 4+ years of experience in website design and development, working with clients from all over the world. Client satisfaction is my top priority.

I have worked on various platforms such as WordPress, Wix, and Squarespace.

My programming skills include HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, and Liquid. I can also help you with on-page SEO.

description.content:
Greetings Fiverr Community,

 

Are you looking for an expert WordPress developer to design or redesign your WordPress website?


You have landed the right gig!


I can help you to create or customize a responsive, unique, SEO-optimized WordPress website for your business!


I offer WordPress expertise, cost-effective solutions, and excellent customer services at an affordable cost.


My portfolio covers various websites, including Personal Blog, Portfolio site, Sales/Landing Page, News Agency, Government, Business, Real Estate/Realtors, Online Store, Art Gallery, University, Doctors, Gaming, and other portfolios & Many more.


Services I Offer:


  • Design a Professional Website
  • Redesign Existing Website for Better Looks and Design
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • SEO-friendly and Responsive
  • Slider, SVG image, and Animation effect.
  • Speed optimization & Fast loading
  • Setup any Payment Gateway
  • Popups, Optin Form, Complex Forms
  • Site Transfer to another Domain or hosting

 

Why Choose Me?


  • Excellent Communication
  • Unlimited revisions
  • Free Support for 30 days
  • 24/7 Customer Support


Be smart; act smartly! Why wait in a busy seller's order queue? Place an order today and enjoy premium.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I contact you before placing an order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, before placing your order. You can contact me and ask any questions you have.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to start working?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'd need your WordPress hosting login and Cpanel login credential to get started. Also, kindly provide your Wix, Weebly, Webflow or Squarespace website link.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will all pages be responsive and mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, All the pages are super mobile friendly and support all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you customize or redesign an existing website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will redesign, customize or fix errors in an existing website also according to your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I send bigger files including my website content?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can send bigger files on Fiverr or upload them on your dropbox account and share the link with me.

reviews.comment: Wonderful work! He is polite, responsive, and quick to make any changes. I just started a new personal training business and it was very important to me to have a nice-looking website according to my new brand! Thank you !

seller_response.comment: Oh thank you so much, I have much enjoyed helping with the project! Thanks a lot!

reviews.comment: It was my initial experience editing on WordPress and exporting a website template, and he was INCREDIBLY supportive. I felt completely stuck, but thanks to his assistance. Must recommend his service.

seller_response.comment: Wonderful client, whom I greatly enjoy working for!

reviews.comment: Working with Rifat Al Shajid was an absolute pleasure! His PROFESSIONALISM in website development exceeded all expectations, and his commitment to going above and beyond made the collaboration seamless. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience—thumbs up! 👍

seller_response.comment: Thanks so much! I’m glad you’re pleased, and I look forward to working with you more!

reviews.comment: What an incredible experience! From beginning to end, he was professional, responsive, and incredibly talented. He delivered a final product that was even better than I had imagined. I will definitely be coming back!

seller_response.comment: Thanks so much! I’m glad you’re pleased, and I look forward to working with you more!

reviews.comment: He transformed our outdated website into something modern and user-friendly. His creativity and technical knowledge are top-notch. So happy with the results! 🚀
